work.name: Alteca
work.summary: Conducting research on unsupervised learning, recommender systems, and emotional chatbots, as well as managing affective computing projects.
highlights: Developing new approaches to multi-modal collaborative clustering and recommender systems.
Supervising R&D projects related to affective computing: emotional response generation, multi-modal emotion recognition, speaker diarization.
Teaching Machine Learning and Data Visualization.

work.name: Sound of AI
work.summary: A open-source research project related to the incorporation of timbral descriptors to enhance the authenticity and richness of the generated audio.
highlights: Led and supervised the dataset team, fostering collaboration and ensuring the team's alignment with project goals.
Designed and implemented efficient data preprocessing pipelines, streamlining the workflow for the neural network models.
Implemented rigorous standards for dataset quality, guaranteeing that the data used in the project was representative, diverse, and well-curated for effective neural audio synthesis.
Paper presented and published at the AIMC 2022 conference.

work.name: Alteca
work.summary: Implementation of a Speech-To-Text solution that aims to translate a person's words on the fly, adding a model to detect the speaker's gender and emotion.

education.summary: CIFRE thesis in affective computing, in collaboration between Alteca and ETIS (Information and Processing System)
courses: Advancements in Multimodal and Unsupervised Learning with Application to Recommender Systems

education.summary: Major in Data Exploration, Data Mining and Business Intelligence

education.institution: National Institute of Statistics and Applied Economics, Morocco
education.summary: Major in Business Intelligence and Data Engineering
